scripts.pretest: mkdir -p build && node -e 'process.stdout.write("var version = \"" + require("./package.json").version + "\"; export default version;");' > src/version.js && rollup -c
scripts.test: eslint index.js src test && faucet `find test -name '*-test.js'`
scripts.prepublish: npm run test && uglifyjs build/d3-quant.js -c -m -o build/d3-quant.min.js && rm -f build/d3-quant.zip && zip -j build/d3-quant.zip -- LICENSE README.md build/d3-quant.js build/d3-quant.min.js
scripts.postpublish: VERSION=`node -e 'console.log(require("./package.json").version)'`; git push && git tag -am "Release $VERSION." v${VERSION} && git push --tags
